A consumer survey revealed that for an average Delhi driver covering 50 km daily, even a 1 km/litre improvement can translate to savings of approximately Rs. 3000 annually. Government subsidies on EVs, plus lower road tax, also contribute to cost savings. Expect to see showrooms packed, with buyers making purchasing decisions based on both mileage and price.
